title: Inclusive Neurtech Workshop with Community
author: Layla Kouara
description: We hosted a co-design workshop with local community centre to explore accessible neurotech use cases.

title: New Publication: Equity in Neurotechnology
author: Layla Kouara
description: Our latest open-access paper outlines a framework for evaluating equity in neurotech research and device deployment.

title: Collaboration Announced with University of Sheffield
author: Layla Kouara
description: We are partnering with researchers at the University of Sheffield to expand our inclusive neurotech research.

title: Neurodiversity and Design Webinar Recap
author: Layla Kouara
description: Missed our latest event? Catch up on key takeaways and recommendations from the webinar on neurodiversity and tech design.

title: Community-Led Research Toolkit Released
author: Layla Kouara
description: Our open-access toolkit supports inclusive research methodologies across neurotech studies.
